TopicTitle: Today i learned that escape Towers make really good 1 use VTOLs

Articles.Content:
I was messing around in sand box today trying to make something using the new escape towers. When i suddenly had the urge to make a VTOL that could go from full flight to a stop in a few seconds then take off vertically.
